item.title: Teleblock when you tele?
item.dc:creator: @rawrnezz rawrnezz
item.description:
@rawrnezz wrote:

Me and my friend recently made a Pvp area. We want it so when you click the teletab, it teleblocks you. Can anyone help us? Here is the code:

} else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("pvp")) { if (teleblock == true) { sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting."); // teleportToX = 3214; teleportToY = 3426; sendMessage( "You teleport to PvP! Good luck :]"); PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+" has just went to PvP. "; }

We have the teletab working too. Just we need it to teleblock you when you tele there. Thanks :]

Read full topic
